definition: bazaar (loanword)
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to prick/to run or stick (a needle etc) into/jug (a classifier for liquids such as beer)
to tie/to bind/classifier for flowers, banknotes etc: bundle/Taiwan pr. [zha2]
variant of 紮|扎[za1]
penetrating (as of cold)/struggle
variant of 紮|扎[zha1]

sentences.english: Have you been to the International Bazaar?
Management of bazaar RouZi burke immediately sent notification usman.
sentences.chinese: 管理巴扎的肉孜伯克立即派人通报乌斯曼。

sentences.english: His strike-partner still has to be decided: Fabio Bazzani, or Atsushi Yanagisawa.
sentences.chinese: 他的搭档将是法比奥巴扎尼或者柳泽敦。

sentences.english: Walking away from the bazaar, we are then instructed in the Iranian art of Ta’arof (ritual courtesy).
sentences.chinese: 走出大巴扎以后，有人教我们伊朗的礼节。

sentences.english: The emotion communicated itself to Bazarov.
sentences.chinese: 这情感也传染到巴扎洛夫身上了。

sentences.english: A corner in the main bazaar of Hotan is dedicated for jade on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 星期天的和田大巴扎的其中一个角落都是卖玉石的。

definition: abbr. for 維吾爾族|维吾尔族, Uighur (Uyghur) ethnic group of Xinjiang
market/bazaar/fair
Uighur ethnic group of Xinjiang
to stuff one's face/to eat greedily
a kind of a flat bread
Eid al-Adha or Festival of the Sacrifice (Qurban), celebrated on the 10th day of the 12th month of the Islamic calendar
muqam, Uyghur melody types that are the basis for a set of suites
Kazakhstan/Kazakh ethnic group in PRC
Kashgar or Qeshqer (Kāshí) city and prefecture in the west of Xinjiang near Kyrgyzstan
Hotan, a major oasis town in southwestern Xinjiang
Uighur person or people
Kuchar Nahiyisi or Kuche county in Aksu 阿克蘇地區|阿克苏地区, Xinjiang
Tajik ethnic group/Tajikistan, former Soviet republic adjoining Xinjiang and Afghanistan
Kashgar or Qeshqer (Chinese Kashi) in the west of Xinjiang near Kyrgyzstan
Kazakh ethnic group of Xinjiang
pilaf (rice dish popular in many parts of the world, including Xinjiang)/pilau
Mekit nahiyisi (Makit county) in Kashgar prefecture 喀什地區|喀什地区[Ka1 shi2 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang
